# Memory And Spans Docs

## Memory and span-related types

- [Overview](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/memory-and-spans/index.md): Learn more about: Memory-related and span-related types
- [Memory<T> and Span<T> usage guidelines](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/standard/memory-and-spans/memory-t-usage-guidelines.md): This article describes Memory<T> and Span<T>, which are buffers of structured data in .NET that can be used in pipelines.
